assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: F&M Co.,Ltd. provides management support and accounting services for medium and small businesses, and individual business owners. It operates through four segments: Accounting Service Business, Consulting Business, Business Solution Business, and Real Estate Leasing Business segments. The company offers accounting services for individual business owners and small businesses; and consulting services provides various information services to the general affairs and accounting departments of small and medium-sized enterprises, ISO and privacy mark certification acquisition support, and subsidy application support services. It also provides Office Station, an ala carte type personnel labor management cloud software; back-office consulting for small and medium-sized enterprises; financial and subsidy application support services for small and medium-sized enterprises; ISO/P mark/HACCP certification service support services for accounting firms; and support services for social insurance and labor consultant offices. In addition, the company operates a computer classroom for seniors, as well as rents office buildings. The company was formerly known as The Flower Co. and changed its name to F&M Co.,Ltd. in December 1993. F&M Co.,Ltd. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
